## Installation

### Stable version
Download the [package source](https://github.com/steverozen/ICAMSxtra/blob/master/data-raw/source-file/ICAMSxtra_0.0.0.9003.tar.gz?raw=true) file to your computer and install ICAMSxtra locally:

``` r
install.packages(pkgs = "path-to-package-source-on-your-computer", repos = NULL, type = "source")
```

### Development version

Install the development version of ICAMSxtra from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with the R command line:

``` r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github(repo = "steverozen/ICAMSxtra", ref = "master")
```
